mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (user_id, company_name, company_intro) VALUES (#{userId}, #{companyName}, #{companyIntro})
mapper.select: SELECT c.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_intro, u.name hr_name, u.gender, u.email, u.phone FROM company c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.company_id = #{companyId}
